::Firearm::

His scanners reporting that Wildrider was out of aiming range 
(because the ash made it much harder to aim), Firearm turns his 
weapons at Dragstrip, firing a missile at him, followed by a heavy 
plasma blast.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: Sorry man, didnt mean it, and sorry i was a bit late, hope 
youre not
> upset.
> 
> BIC:
> Drag Strip kept moving, avoiding most of the machine gun fire, some 
of it
> hitting his side. He started to drive circles around symphony, 
turning his
> plasma blasters at her, and blasting 2 times, (that would be four 
plasma
> bursts as its double barrel).
